snippet: N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell’s varying responses to disciplinary problems, including the Ray Rice domestic-violence case, have led critics to call for him to step down.
abstract: Analysis; NFL commissioner Roger Goodell's varying responses to violations of league's personal conduct policy have sown confusion and resentment among players and fans who feel the league has not acted consistently or fairly; league has not provided teams with clear guidelines; disparities are leading critics to call for Goodell to step down.
lead_paragraph: N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell’s varying responses to disciplinary problems, including the Ray Rice domestic-violence case, have led critics to call for him to step down.

headline.seo: Roger Goodell’s Change of Ray Rice Ban Doesn’t Quiet Criticism
headline.main: In League Ruled by Fiat, Response Seen as Flailing
headline.print_headline: In League Ruled by Fiat, Response Seen as Flailing
